attachments.title: Changing the background color of a 3D Scene in Makie
attachments.text: That works for me as well but I think the issue I’m seeing has to do with wanting to have a different background color in a 3D LScene within a larger layout which has another background color. I probably should have made that part clearer in my post. With regards to what I was observing about performance when I used :purple I just noticed something that I hadn’t before: it seems that the background in this case actually isn’t a constant purple but actually there is a very subtle color gradient...
